39.heading: Le Chemin de l'Amérique. English.
39.title: Road to America
39.author: Baru ; with Jean-Marc Thévenet ; colors, Daniel Ledran ; translation, Helge Dascher ; lettering, Dirk Rehm.
notes: Translation of: Le Chemin de l'Amérique.

"Set in 1950s Algeria during that country's long and bloody struggle to free itself from French colonial rule. Cartoonist Baru documents an impoverished boxer's turbulent rise to fame amidst the chaos the chaos surrounding him and his family, from the slums of his hometown in Algeria to the bright lights of Paris."

40.author: by Jacques Dutrey

notes: Report and list of 1991 awards: Grand prize to Gotlib; best album to Le Chemin de l'Amerique (Baru & Thevenet); best foreign album to Manuel Montano (Prado and Luna); best humor album (a tie) to Le Pauvre Chevalier (F'Murr) and L'Encyclopedie des Bébés (Goossens); best first album to L'Origine (Mathieu); readers' choice to Le Dernier Chant des Malaterre (Bourgeon); best album for young people: Dans le Peau d'un Chat (Colman and Desberg).

45.heading: Le Chemin de la Ville Basse.
45.title: "Hent Keris = Le Chemin de la Ville Basse"
45.author: Deschamps ; Auclair
notes: Introduction: "Contre l'histoire officielle de la France, Auclair et Deschamps ont bâti ce récit, à travers lequel ils partent à la recherche des peuples 'sans histoire', ceux qu'on appelle les 'minorités'. Ils entreprennent là une véritable chasse au trésor: Celle de nos anciennes langues anonymes; celle des traditions et des pensées enfoules qu'évoquent encore les bardes bretons d'aujourd'hui, lors des 'Fest nos vras', quand ils rendent vie à l'ancienne Armorique, à travers des légendes comme celle de Bran Ruzh, le corbeau rouge."

163.title: Cheng shi lie ren [videorecording] = City Hunter
163.author: jian zhi Cai Lan ; dao yan, bian ju Wong Jing.
notes: 1 videodisc : sd., col. ; 4 3/4 in.
Cast: Jackie Chan, Joey Wong.
DVD.

Summary (from OCLC): Ryu Saeba, hired to find a runaway daughter, discovers her location on a cruise ship. Instead of focusing on returning the woman he wants to become romantically involved with her. When criminals hijack the ship to hold the passengers for ransom, its up to Ryo to save the day.
Originally released as a motion picture in 1992.
In Cantonese or English with Chinese and English subtitles.
"Based on a popular Japanese comic strip."

Special features: exclusive interviews with cast and crew, new City Hunter outtakes video, Jackie Chan movie photo gallery and biography, movie photo gallery, new and original trailers, original promotional materials.
